articles.title: Boris Johnson, Who Had Tested Covid+, Self-Isolates Again - NDTV
articles.description: British Prime Minister Boris Johnson went into isolation after a contact tested positive for the coronavirus, as a stay-at-home advisory came into effect for the United States' third-biggest city on Monday.
articles.content:
Boris Johnson was hospitalised with coronavirus in April.
